name: Bloodlust Cerene
summary: Bloodlust Cerene is a fresh 3DX adventure based in medieval dream. We lastly receive to explore the historical settings, outfits, manners, magic this dream era has to suggest, but with a far greater amount interesting ingredient: sex! And let’s not forget about vampires. No dream setting is complete out of vampires. Everyone know that. But our vampire – the enchanting, tender and greatly virginal Cerene is a very different kind of vampire….
